experiment_name: E. coli surface display of streptavidin for directed evolution of an allylic deallylase
additional_information: reaction_condition: reaction_temperature:30 °C;    reaction_ph:7.4;    reaction_other_conditions:E. coli cells displaying Sav variants, 2 µM [CpRu(QA-Biot)(H2O)]3 pre-incubation on ice for 30 min, 16 h, 310 rpm;    reaction_substrate_concentration:500 µM
